channel.title: Project Valacity 317 Development
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt][b]Introduction[/b][/size] Hey everyone, my name is Vexillum and I am going to be starting a Project called Valacity. I stride to make this a great server with both Player Killing and economy. Most skills work and I will be using a base called RuneRefliction. I and others soon to be helping with Project Valacity will try our best to make this a unique server. We will not go overboard with the crowded homes we call "unique" and such. This server will be made to the best of my ,and other developers, ability.[/center]
Credits: Int Bauk (Base + a couple pics) Me
[center][size=18pt][b]The Server[/b][/size] Valacity will include quite a few features:
- 100% Report System - 100% Clan Chat - NPC/Player Clippage - Fully working Gliding system - Clue Scrolls - Ring of Dueling/Glory works - All Skillcapes work - Edgeville home with Shops - Perfect Switching - Low amount of lag - PK Points - Webclient - Dragon Claws - Chaotics - A few Quests - Training - Minigames (Barrows, Duel Arena, Fight Pits, ect.) - Bosses (Chaos Elemental, Dagganoth Kings, Sea Troll Queen, ect.) - Monsters (Experiments, Slayer Tower, Dungeon, Ect.) - 100% Pyramid Plunder - Fletching - Crafting - Thieving - Woodcutting - Firemaking - Mining - Smithing - And much more![/center]
[center][size=18pt][b]Pictures[/b][/size] [IMG]http://img851.imageshack.us/img851/6375/49608801.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1052.photobucket.com/albums/s441/jcales98/spec.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1052.photobucket.com/albums/s441/jcales98/skills.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1052.photobucket.com/albums/s441/jcales98/pkpshop.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1052.photobucket.com/albums/s441/jcales98/teleport.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1052.photobucket.com/albums/s441/jcales98/sweets.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1052.photobucket.com/albums/s441/jcales98/stores.jpg[/img] [img]http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/1285/58431830.png[/img][/center] Note; I will add more pics later.
[center][size=18pt][b]The Team[/b][/size] [b]Server Developer(s):[/b] [i]1/2[/i] [i]Me[/i]
[b]Beta Tester(s):[/b] [i]0/6[/i] [i]In urgent need of these! Really need to test a few things and take some pics![/i]
[b]Web Developer(s):[/b] [i]0/2[/i] [i]We urgently need at least 1 of these. Must have some experience.[/i]
[b]Administrator(s):[/b] [i]1/2[/i] [i]Same as Moderators except more advanced.[/i]
[b]Moderator(s):[/b] [i]0/3[/i] [i]These are to watch over the players/server and make sure all is going well.[/i][/center]
[center][size=18pt][b]Application Format[/b][/size] [code]Applying for: Experience in that field: Proof?: What other developments have you worked with?: Are you loyal?: Will you be serious about your job?: Skype?: Msn?: Any other info?:[/code]
[size=24pt]Feedback is much appreciated![/size][/center]
Thanks, Vex

item.title: Project Valacity 317 Development
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

[center][size=18pt]Introduction[/size]
Hey everyone, my name is Vexillum and I am going to be starting a Project called Valacity. I stride to make this a great server with both Player Killing and economy. Most skills work and I will be using a base called RuneRefliction. I and others soon to be helping with Project Valacity will try our best to make this a unique server. We will not go overboard with the crowded homes we call “unique” and such. This server will be made to the best of my ,and other developers, ability.[/center]

Credits:
Int Bauk (Base + a couple pics)
Me

[center][size=18pt]The Server[/size]
Valacity will include quite a few features:

  • 100% Report System
  • 100% Clan Chat
  • NPC/Player Clippage
  • Fully working Gliding system
  • Clue Scrolls
  • Ring of Dueling/Glory works
  • All Skillcapes work
  • Edgeville home with Shops
  • Perfect Switching
  • Low amount of lag
  • PK Points
  • Webclient
  • Dragon Claws
  • Chaotics
  • A few Quests
  • Training
  • Minigames (Barrows, Duel Arena, Fight Pits, ect.)
  • Bosses (Chaos Elemental, Dagganoth Kings, Sea Troll Queen, ect.)
  • Monsters (Experiments, Slayer Tower, Dungeon, Ect.)
  • 100% Pyramid Plunder
  • Fletching
  • Crafting
  • Thieving
  • Woodcutting
  • Firemaking
  • Mining
  • Smithing
  • And much more![/center]

[center][size=18pt]Pictures[/size]

spec.jpg783×541

skills.jpg766×502

pkpshop.jpg779×543

teleport.jpg780×545

sweets.jpg780×547

stores.jpg783×547

[/center]
Note; I will add more pics later.

[center][size=18pt]The Team[/size]
Server Developer(s): 1/2
Me

Beta Tester(s): 0/6
In urgent need of these! Really need to test a few things and take some pics!

Web Developer(s): 0/2
We urgently need at least 1 of these. Must have some experience.

Administrator(s): 1/2
Same as Moderators except more advanced.

Moderator(s): 0/3
These are to watch over the players/server and make sure all is going well.[/center]

[center][size=18pt]Application Format[/size]

Applying for: Experience in that field: Proof?: What other developments have you worked with?: Are you loyal?: Will you be serious about your job?: Skype?: Msn?: Any other info?:

[size=24pt]Feedback is much appreciated![/size][/center]

Thanks,
Vex
